jsf:attribute.name: height
jsf:attribute.shortDescription: Defines the height of the map

jsf:attribute.name: width
jsf:attribute.shortDescription: Defines the width of the map

jsf:attribute.name: centerX
jsf:attribute.shortDescription: x coordinate of the map's initial center

jsf:attribute.name: centerY
jsf:attribute.shortDescription: y coordinate of the map's initial center

jsf:attribute.name: value
jsf:attribute.shortDescription: A GeoJSF map object to be displayed. If none given, geojsf:layer definitions are required!
